front.title: Local Mobility Anchor Discovery Using DNS by Service Name

abstract.t: This draft defines a Domain Name System (DNS)-based scheme to enabledynamic discovery of a Local Mobility Anchor (LMA) in Proxy MobileIPv6. DNS Service Resource Record option is used allowing a MobileAccess Gateway (MAG) to request the LMA's Fully Qualified Domain Name(FQDN) and possibly IPv6 address via the DNS response. IPv4 case isalso covered.
